name: Corrupted Souls
description:
Each time you execute an undead mob, you will have a 50% chance to get a corrupted soul. When you get 50 souls, you will be able to right click in an Ancient City portal to exchange the souls for power (only avaliable 4 times).
- 1st time: Secondary Ability level up, 5% bonus Eldritch spell power and unlock Sculk Crown ability (Middle Click).
- 2nd time: Secondary Ability level up, 5% bonus Eldritch spell power and Primary Ability level up.
- 3rd time: Secondary Ability level up, 5% bonus Eldritch spell power, +15% max health, +15% attack damage, +15% armor and +15% armor toughness.
- 4th time: Secondary Ability level up, 5% bonus Eldritch spell, +10% speed and +2% current HP damage.
